column4: is there a way I can tell maybe dpkg or apt to ignore a particular problematic dependency which I installed on my own?
not exactly, but you can force a version so it is locked and apt / synaptic will not upgrade it
if the package u installed does not satisfy the dependency by dpkg standards, you can also use equivs
for complex dependency issues i use aptitude, it has the best conflict resolution and shows you exactly what a package needs easily
